page.title: 03NURSERY & PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: There are two {Nursery}and four{ {Primary}schools in the area serving the educational needs of children in the 3 to 11 age range. The two {Nursery}schools are modern, purpose built units, one situated at Mossley and the other at Monkstown.They offer a wide variety of play facilities for the pre-school child and are staffed by specially trained teachers,who help prepare the children for the transition to Primary School. Of the four{Primary} schools, three are controlled(totally funded from Government sources)while one,St.McNissi's is maintained (partially funded by the Roman Catholic Church).When the children reach Primary 7 they go through a transfer procedure including the 11+ examination for Secondary School.
